RtecEventChannelAdmin::EventChannel::CANT_REMOVE_OBSERVER Exception Reference

Exception raised if the Event Channel is unable to remove an observer due to some internal limitation or because the observer cannot be found. More...

import "RtecEventChannelAdmin.idl";

Detailed Description

Exception raised if the Event Channel is unable to remove an observer due to some internal limitation or because the observer cannot be found.

Exceptions:
CANT_REMOVE_OBSERVER
